overview:
Wes is a co-founder at Mobywan, responsible for Android, BlackBerry & web development, graphics, and user interface design.

Wes recently spent three years in investment banking with Stifel Financial (formerly Thomas Weisel & Westwind Partners) gaining experience in corporate finance and M&A advisory. He holds a BMOS, specializing in Finance & Administration from Huron University College at the University of Western Ontario.
